entry.title: please focus
entry.summary:
Author: lovelyjules

Summary: As a stylist with experience working for top K-pop groups, I’ve always prided myself on professionalism and composure. But stepping into a new job with Stray Kids, one particular leader’s intense presence and relentless teasing is pushing every boundary I’ve set. In a world where professionalism is key and every move is watched, can I maintain my cool—or will he uncover a side of me I’ve kept hidden?

entry.title: A killers nest could be the safest place
entry.summary:
Author: Inceptionalfever

Summary: Innocent Jisung was the witness of a murder, it didn’t matter if the person was a murderer themselves and a bad person in general. So the “Strays” (nectarous for avenging those who never got a chance, and taking down those who harmed innocents) couldn’t let him walk away for the risk of telling anyone.But because he was an innocent meant they couldn’t harm him.Follow these snippets of Jisung’s time with the Strays gang as they love him and realize that the innocent boy they took needs to be protected, possibly from even themselves. Not in chronological order
